Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.

trans-unit.source: A display is present which is not fully controllable without the app

trans-unit.id: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.source: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.target: Eine Auflösung des Schreibtisches, kleiner als 720p, ist nicht ideal für die Benutzung von macOS, weil die Elemente der GUI möglicherweise nicht passen. Dies betrifft sowohl virtuelle Bildschirme als auch den Regler für die Auflösung von Displays.

trans-unit.id: A pop-up notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.source: A pop-up notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.target: Ein virtueller Bildschirm ist ähnlich zu einem realen Display und existiert jedoch nur in dem virtuellen Raum (in dem Arbeitsspeicher des Computers). Er kann benutzt werden, um ihn in einem Bild-in-Bild Fenster anzuzeigen, auf ein reales Display zu spiegeln oder streamen, oder um ihn als Quelle einer geeigneten App für eine Bildschirmaufnahme oder Screencast zu verwenden.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Ein virtueller Bildschirm, der mit einem Display gekoppelt ist, wird automatisch verbunden oder getrennt, wenn das gekoppelte Display verbunden oder getrennt wird. Automatisches Trennen kann für gekoppelte virtuelle Bildschirme deaktiviert werden.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Ein virtueller Bildschirm, der mit einem Display gekoppelt ist, wird automatisch verbunden, wenn das gekoppelte Display verbunden wird. Alle anderen virtuellen Bildschirme wurden verbunden. Automatisches Verbinden kann für gekoppelte virtuelle Bildschirme deaktiviert werden.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Ein virtueller Bildschirm, der mit einem Display gekoppelt ist, wird automatisch getrennt, wenn das gekoppelte Display getrennt wird. Alle anderen virtuellen Bildschirme wurden getrennt. Automatisches Trennen kann für gekoppelte virtuelle Bildschirme deaktiviert werden.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect automatically when the associated display is connected.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect automatically when the associated display is connected.
trans-unit.target: Ein virtueller Bildschirm, der mit einem Display gekoppelt ist, wird automatisch verbunden, wenn das gekoppelte Display verbunden wird.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will disconnect automatically when the associated display is disconnected.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will disconnect automatically when the associated display is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Ein virtueller Bildschirm, der mit einem Display gekoppelt ist, wird automatisch getrennt, wenn das gekoppelte Display getrennt wird.

trans-unit.id: Accessibility Permissions are configured but the **app still needs to be restarted** for the changes to take effect! Please close and restart the app when it is convenient or press the "Restart %@" button below to restart the app immediately!
trans-unit.source: Accessibility Permissions are configured but the **app still needs to be restarted** for the changes to take effect! Please close and restart the app when it is convenient or press the "Restart %@" button below to restart the app immediately!
trans-unit.target: Die Berechtigungen für die Bedienungshilfen sind eingerichtet, und **die App muss immer noch neu gestartet werden**, damit die Änderungen wirksam werden! Bitte beende und starte die App erneut, wenn es passt. Oder drücke auf die "Neustart von %@" Taste, um die App sofort neu zu starten!

trans-unit.id: Accessibility Permissions are properly configured. Native (Apple) keyboard brightness and volume keys should work if these features are otherwise set up. If not, please try restarting the app!

trans-unit.id: Activated only when the display is not set as main so it does not interfere with the lock screen. Most displays do not support turning the backlight off or back on via DDC.
trans-unit.source: Activated only when the display is not set as main so it does not interfere with the lock screen. Most displays do not support turning the backlight off or back on via DDC.
trans-unit.target: Wird nur aktiviert, wenn der Monitor nicht als Hauptbildschirm benutzt wird, damit der Sperrbildschirm nicht gestört wird. Die meisten Monitore unterstützen das Ein- und Ausschalten der Hintergrundbeleuchtung durch DDC nicht.

trans-unit.source: Allows only one device to show more options via the more options chevron. This helps with menu bloating when several displays are present.

trans-unit.source: Allows restoring zero software brightness levels and combined brightness levels with the hardware brightness component being lower than the current reported brightness level for Apple displays (these might be invalid restore values saved during a dark wake period).
trans-unit.target: Ermöglicht die Wiederherstellung von Null-Software-Helligkeitsstufen und kombinierten Helligkeitsstufen, wobei die Hardware-Helligkeitskomponente niedriger ist als die aktuell gemeldete Helligkeitsstufe für Apple-Displays (dies können ungültige Wiederherstellungswerte sein, die während einer dunklen Wake-Periode gespeichert werden).

trans-unit.id: Apple Silicon Macs tend freeze the display instead of letting it go to standby upon sleep when a virtual screen is being mirrored. This workaround that tries to fix this issue.
trans-unit.source: Apple Silicon Macs tend freeze the display instead of letting it go to standby upon sleep when a virtual screen is being mirrored. This workaround that tries to fix this issue.

trans-unit.target: Eigene EDID auf dieses Display automatisch anwenden, wenn es erkannt wird

trans-unit.id: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display.
trans-unit.source: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display.
trans-unit.target: Virtuellen Bildschirm automatisch spiegeln, damit der Inhalt auf dem gekoppeltem Display angezeigt wird.

trans-unit.id: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be mirror target.
trans-unit.source: Automatically configure mirroring to show the virtual screen's content on the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be mirror target.
trans-unit.target: Virtuellen Bildschirm automatisch spiegeln, damit der Inhalt auf dem gekoppeltem Display angezeigt wird. Wenn mehrere Displays verbunden sind, wird nur eines das Ziel der Spiegelung.

trans-unit.id: Automatically connect the virtual screen when the associated display is online and disconnect when it is not.
trans-unit.source: Automatically connect the virtual screen when the associated display is online and disconnect when it is not.
trans-unit.target: Virtuellen Bildschirm automatisch verbinden, wenn das gekoppelte Display online ist, und die Verbindung trennen, wenn es nicht so ist.

trans-unit.id: Automatically disable off both Night Shift and True Tone when an external third party display is set to HDR mode and enable them when switching back to SDR mode. Useful for more accurate colors when watching HDR content.
trans-unit.source: Automatically disable off both Night Shift and True Tone when an external third party display is set to HDR mode and enable them when switching back to SDR mode. Useful for more accurate colors when watching HDR content.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiviere automatisch Night Shift und True Tone, wenn bei einem externen Display eines anderen Anbieters der HDR-Modus eingestellt ist und aktiviere diese, wenn zurück auf den SDR-Modus geschaltet wird. Nützlich für akkuratere Farben, beim Ansehen von HDR-Inhalten.

trans-unit.id: Automatically remove stored configuration details for displays that have not been connected for a while.
trans-unit.source: Automatically remove stored configuration details for displays that have not been connected for a while.
trans-unit.target: Gespeicherte Einstellungen für Displays automatisch entferne, wenn diese für eine Weile nicht verbunden waren.

trans-unit.id: Automatically stream the virtual screen's content to the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be stream target.
trans-unit.source: Automatically stream the virtual screen's content to the associated display. If multiple associated displays are connected, only one will be stream target.
trans-unit.target: Inhalt eines virtuellen Bildschirm automatisch zu dem gekoppeltem Display streamen. Wenn mehrere Displays verbunden sind, wird nur eines das Ziel des Streams.

trans-unit.id: Be careful with this setting as it will grab control even if another audio output is selected!

trans-unit.id: Changes (delta values) are replicated. If ranges differ, no rebasing is performed.

trans-unit.id: Close the expanded menu item when the app menu is closed. Disabling this preserves the menu layout for the next time the app menu is opened.

trans-unit.source: Color changes, upscaling and dimming via color table adjustments clip HDR content. With this enabled, the app resets the color table when no adjustments are needed. This might be distracting or cause a black screen on some configurations.

Wenn dies aktiviert ist, setzt die App die Farbtabelle zurück wenn keine Anpassungen nötig sind. Dies könnte ablenkend wirken oder bei manchen Konfigurationen einen blanken Bildschirm verursachen.

trans-unit.id: Combine hardware brightness control (if available), software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling into one unified brightness control.
trans-unit.source: Combine hardware brightness control (if available), software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling into one unified brightness control.

trans-unit.source: Configure virtual screen/stream rotation - useful for portrait Sidecar or for displays that do not support changing orientation. With Sidecar you can decide whether the USB-C port (lightning connector) should face up or down.

trans-unit.id: Connects the virtual screen and starts full screen streaming from the virtual screen to the display. Also sets up the full screen stream to automatically start whenever the display is connected.
trans-unit.source: Connects the virtual screen and starts full screen streaming from the virtual screen to the display. Also sets up the full screen stream to automatically start whenever the display is connected.
trans-unit.target: Verbindet den virtuellen Bildschirm und startet einen Vollbildstream zu dem Display. Außerdem wird der Vollbildstream so eingestellt, dass er automatisch startet, wenn das Display verbunden wird.
Kopiere den Namen des aktuellen Gerätes

trans-unit.id: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.
trans-unit.source: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.

Am besten dafür geeignet, wenn der virtuelle Bildschirm zu einem Display gestreamt (z. B. für Sidecar im Portrait modus) oder gespiegelt werden soll.

trans-unit.source: Create a virtual screen with a custom aspect ratio. You can also set up a custom resolution list with varying aspect ratios after creating the virtual screen.

trans-unit.id:
Displays will turn blank for a while and you will not be able to interact with your Mac. The process should take about 2-4 seconds.

trans-unit.source:
Displays will turn blank for a while and you will not be able to interact with your Mac. The process should take about 2-4 seconds.
The process does not work for the built-in display (reboot needed). The operation might cause some Macs to enter sleep mode.
trans-unit.target:
Die Displays werden, für eine kurze Zeit, leer werden und du kannst nicht mit dem Mac interagieren. Der Prozess sollte zirka 2 bis 4 Sekunden dauern.
Der Prozess kann nicht auf das integrierte Display angewendet werden (dazu ist ein Neustart nötig). Der Vorgang kann dazu führen, dass manche Macs in den Ruhezustand gehen.

trans-unit.id: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serves as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.source: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serves as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.

trans-unit.id: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.source: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.

trans-unit.id: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.source: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.

trans-unit.id: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.source: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.

trans-unit.id: This is a workaround of an issue present in some versions of macOS Sonoma which occasionally prevents a display's custom configuration to be loaded properly. With this setting the app attempts to reinitialize the display if flexible scaling resolutions seem to be missing.
trans-unit.source: This is a workaround of an issue present in some versions of macOS Sonoma which occasionally prevents a display's custom configuration to be loaded properly. With this setting the app attempts to reinitialize the display if flexible scaling resolutions seem to be missing.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist eine Problemumgehung eines Problems, das in einigen Versionen von macOS Sonoma vorhanden ist und gelegentlich verhindert, dass die benutzerdefinierte Konfiguration eines Displays ordnungsgemäß geladen wird. Mit dieser Einstellung versucht die App, die Anzeige neu zu initialisieren, wenn Auflösungen der flexiblen Skalierung zu fehlen scheinen.

trans-unit.id: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.source: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.

trans-unit.id:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.source:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ For best results stick close to the display aspect ratio!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Um die besten Ergebnisse zu erzielen, nahe beim Seitenverhältnis des Displays bleiben!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected XDR preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected XDR preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Für dieses XDR-Display ist es am besten, die Kalibrierung auf "Standard - Automatische Kalibrierung" zu setzen, damit die App die Hochskalierung automatisch an die aktuell ausgewählten XDR-Voreinstellungen und Umweltfaktoren anpassen kann. Für die manuelle Kalibrierung, den Helligkeitsregler so hoch wie möglich einstellen, und gleichzeitig sicher stellen, dass immer noch das lächelnde Gesicht zu sehen ist!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Full screen streaming is unavailable as it requires Screen Recording permissions. You can grant this under System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Recording!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Full screen streaming is unavailable as it requires Screen Recording permissions. You can grant this under System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Recording!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Bildschirmfüllendes Streaming ist nicht verfügbar, weil die Berechtigung zur Bildschirmaufnahme fehlt. Dies kann unter Systemeinstellungen > Datenschutz & Sicherheit > Bildschirmaufnahme gewährt werden!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Wenn eine App eines Drittanbieters (wie MediaMate) verwendet wird, um das OSD anzuzeigen, sollte das integrierte OSD unter Tastatur / OSD deaktivieren werden. Damit wird vermieden, dass doppelte oder gemischte OSDs angezeigt werden!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ If you want to mirror/stream the virtual screen to a natively connected display only to get flexible HiDPI resolutions, it is recommended to use the flexible scaling feature instead if possible! If you want to use mirroring instead of streaming, this can be enabled in the app menu once the virtual screen was connected.
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If you want to mirror/stream the virtual screen to a natively connected display only to get flexible HiDPI resolutions, it is recommended to use the flexible scaling feature instead if possible! If you want to use mirroring instead of streaming, this can be enabled in the app menu once the virtual screen was connected.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Wenn das Spiegeln / Streamen von einem virtuellen Bildschirm, nur für eine flexible HiDPI-Auflösung eines verbundenen Displays gemacht wird, wird empfohlen, die Funktion "Flexible Skalierung" zu benutzen (so möglich)! Wenn Spiegeln anstelle von Streaming genutzt werden soll, kann dies im Menü der App aktiviert werden, nachdem der virtuelle Bildschirm verbunden wurde.

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ It is recommended to have some more leeway in the range!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ It is recommended to have some more leeway in the range!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Es wird empfohlen, etwas mehr Spielraum in dem Bereich zu haben!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Metal performance might be degraded on this device with integrated Intel GPU.
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Metal performance might be degraded on this device with integrated Intel GPU.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Die Metal-Leistung könnte auf diesem Gerät, durch die integrierte Intel-GPU, abgeschwächt sein.

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Minimum width/height value should be lower than the maximum!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Minimum width/height value should be lower than the maximum!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Der minimale Wert von Breite / Höhe muss kleiner sein, als das Maximum!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Notifications are turned off for the app. Fix this under System Settings > Notifications!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Notifications are turned off for the app. Fix this under System Settings > Notifications!
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Die Mitteilungen sind für die App ausgeschaltet. Das kann unter Systemeinstellungen > Mitteilungen geändert werden.

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Some display group based features are not available in this app version.
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Some display group based features are not available in this app version.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Manche Features die auf Displaygruppen basieren, sind in der Version dieser App nicht verfügbar.

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ This platform (Intel) does not support upscaling when color table adjustments are enabled.
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ This platform (Intel) does not support upscaling when color table adjustments are enabled.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Dies Plattform (Intel) unterstützt die Hochskalierung nicht, wenn Anpassungen der Farbtabelle aktiviert ist.

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ Unable to enable DDC due to display or connection issues.
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Unable to enable DDC due to display or connection issues.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Es ist nicht möglich DDC zu aktivieren, wegen einem Problem mit dem Monitor oder der Verbindung.
